author: Suzanne Collins
title: Sunrise on the Reaping
description: The Fiftieth Annual Hunger Games are about to begin. Who will be tribute? Who will live and die? Return to Panem for more pulse-pounding action than ever before. Oh, and may the odds be ever in your favor.

author: Mel Robbins
title: The Let Them Theory
description: A life-changing tool millions of people canâ€™t stop talking about. What if the key to happiness, success, and love was as simple as two words?.

author: Genki Kawamura
title: If Cats Disappeared from the World
description: Tender, hopeful and cozier than drinking your favorite tea, uncover the mysteries of life alongside one unforgettable character and his loyal companion in this big-hearted story.

author: Bess Kalb
title: Buffalo Fluffalo
description: Centering on the unique lead character Huffalo Buffalo, who also happens to be very fluffy, this is a story that will inspire kids and grownups to accept who they are.

author: Rebecca Yarros
title: Fourth Wing
description: A young scribe is thrust into an elite war college for dragon riders where the only rule is graduate or perish. An addictive fantasy with epic levels of spice and world-building.
